I do not have access to up-to-date research on this specific topic. however, it is possible that there have been studies or surveys conducted on the impact of the film on attitudes towards religion and religious people. 

it is important to note that the impact of media on attitudes and beliefs can be complex and multifaceted, and it may be difficult to isolate the specific effects of a single film or piece of media. additionally, individual experiences and perceptions can play a significant role in shaping attitudes towards religion and religious people. 

if you are interested in researching this topic further, i would recommend looking for studies or surveys on the impact of media on attitudes towards religion and applying those findings to the context of the film.
